description: Trading Agent Configuration - Edit these values to tune strategy
update_note: Feb 2026: Further relaxed entry conditions - ADX 12.5→8.0, BB margin +2%, Volume 1.5→1.1x, RSI 80→85

api.note: Set these as environment variables, not in this file

adx.description: Trending market threshold - only trade when ADX > this (further relaxed from 12.5)

bollinger_bands.description: Entry when price within 2% of lower band (relaxed from exact touch)

rsi.description: Don't buy if RSI > this threshold (further relaxed from 80.0)

atr.description: For dynamic stop-loss and trailing calculations

volume.description: Entry requires volume > this × average (relaxed from 1.5)

trailing_stop.description: Trail remaining position with this × ATR

paper_trading.note: Set enabled=false to switch to live trading (HIGH RISK)

monitoring.description: How often to check market (seconds), log verbosity (DEBUG/INFO/WARNING/ERROR)
